content.raw:
Work has started on this, so far in the `win_gerkey` branch.  No promises on timeline, but we're making some progress.  I'll record in this ticket things that are being disabled along the way, so that we don't forget to revisit them:

* libtar usage commented out in `common/ModelDatabase.cc`: libtar apparently doesn't work on Windows
* SSE supported disabled in `cmake/FindSSE.cmake`
content.html:
Work has started on this, so far in the win_gerkey branch. No promises on timeline, but we're making some progress. I'll record in this ticket things that are being disabled along the way, so that we don't forget to revisit them:

  • libtar usage commented out in common/ModelDatabase.cc: libtar apparently doesn't work on Windows
  • SSE supported disabled in cmake/FindSSE.cmake
